triples.name: Object Constraint Language
triples.relevance: OCL is the constraint language that the paper analyzes and translates to first-order logic.

triples.name: First-order logic
triples.relevance: The paper proposes a mapping from OCL into first-order logic as a novel contribution.

triples.name: Automated theorem proving
triples.relevance: The paper uses automated theorem provers as a tool to check unsatisfiability of OCL constraints.

triples.name: Satisfiability modulo theories
triples.relevance: The paper uses SMT solvers, which are tools for solving satisfiability modulo theories problems.

triples.name: Constraint satisfaction problem
triples.relevance: The paper addresses the task of checking constraint satisfaction through unsatisfiability analysis.
